trans-unit.source: Encapsulates the methods and search patterns used to execute a query against the underlying principal store.
trans-unit.target: Encapsula os métodos e os padrões de pesquisa usados para executar uma consulta em relação ao repositório de entidade de segurança subjacente.

trans-unit.source: The default page size of 256 KB is used when the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher> class performs a query for domain principals.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho de página padrão de 256 KB é usado quando o <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher> classe executa uma consulta para entidades de segurança de domínio.

trans-unit.source: The application may override the default value by setting the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher.PageSize%2A> property in the underlying <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher> object that is returned from the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.GetUnderlyingSearcher%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O aplicativo pode substituir o valor padrão, definindo o <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher.PageSize%2A> propriedade subjacente <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher> objeto que é retornado o <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.GetUnderlyingSearcher%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter" /> property must be set before the Principal searcher object can be used to perform a search.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter" /> deve ser definida antes de o objeto de ferramenta de pesquisa de entidades de segurança poder ser usado para realizar uma pesquisa.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter" /> property must be set before the Principal searcher object can be used to perform a search.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter" /> deve ser definida antes de o objeto de ferramenta de pesquisa de entidades de segurança poder ser usado para realizar uma pesquisa.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal" /> object that specifies the filter to use for the search.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal" /> que especifica o filtro a ser usado na pesquisa.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter" /> property is initialized to this value.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter" /> é inicializada com esse valor.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher" /> class with the specified query filter.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher" /> com o filtro de consulta especificado.

trans-unit.source: Persisted principal objects can not be used as the <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter" />.
trans-unit.target: Objetos de entidade de segurança persistentes não podem ser usados como o <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter" />.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="queryFilter" /> parameter cannot be null or empty.
trans-unit.target: O parâmetro <paramref name="queryFilter" /> não pode ser nulo ou vazio.

trans-unit.source: Gets that principal context that is used to perform the query.
trans-unit.target: Obtém esse contexto de entidade de segurança usado para executar a consulta.

trans-unit.source: The context specifies the server or domain against which search operations are performed.
trans-unit.target: O contexto especifica o servidor ou domínio com relação ao qual as operações de pesquisa são executadas.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContext" /> object that specifies the server or domain against which operations are performed.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContext" /> que especifica o servidor ou domínio no qual as operações são executadas.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContext> object contained in this property is obtained from the context property of the principal object set in the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContext> objeto contido nesta propriedade é obtido da propriedade de contexto do objeto principal definidas <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Queries are performed using the credentials specified in the principal context object and the container specified in the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContext.Container*> property.
trans-unit.target: Consultas são executadas usando as credenciais especificadas no objeto de contexto principal e o contêiner especificado no <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContext.Container*> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: For <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.ContextType.Domain> and <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.ContextType.ApplicationDirectory> context types, the container is the Distinguished Name (DN) of a container object.
trans-unit.target: Para <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.ContextType.Domain> e <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.ContextType.ApplicationDirectory> tipos de contexto, o contêiner é o nome diferenciado (DN) de um objeto de contêiner.

trans-unit.source: Disposes the current instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Descarta a instância atual do objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns a principal search result that contains a collection of all the principal objects that match the principal specified in the query filter property.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um resultado de pesquisa de entidades de segurança que contém uma coleção de todos os objetos de entidade de segurança que correspondem à entidade de segurança especificada na propriedade de filtro de consulta.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearchResult'1" /> object that matches the query filter or an empty collection if no results are found.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearchResult'1" /> que coincide com o filtro de consulta ou uma coleção vazia se nenhum resultado for encontrado.

trans-unit.source: The principal objects returned in the principal search result match the type of object contained in the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Os objetos principais retornados na correspondência de resultados de pesquisa principal o tipo de objeto contido no <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The search is conducted in the context specified in the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.Context%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: A pesquisa é realizada no contexto especificado no <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.Context%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the Query by Example overview topic.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte o tópico de visão geral de Consulta por Exemplo.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter" /> contains referential properties.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter" /> contém propriedades referenciais.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the Query by Example overview topic.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte o tópico de visão geral de Consulta por Exemplo.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter" /> is a persisted principal.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter" /> é uma entidade de segurança persistente.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter" /> must first be assigned to the principal searcher before the query can be performed.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter" /> deve ser atribuído primeiro ao pesquisador de entidades de segurança antes que a consulta seja realizada.

trans-unit.source: Returns a principal search result that contains the first principal object found that matches the principal specified in the <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um resultado de pesquisa de entidades que contém o primeiro objeto de entidade de segurança encontrado que corresponde à entidade de segurança especificada na propriedade <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal" /> object that contains the principal object that matches the query filter or null if no results are found.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal" /> que contém o objeto de entidade de segurança que corresponde ao filtro de consulta ou nulo se nenhum resultado é encontrado.

trans-unit.source: If there is exactly one match of the object specified in the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter%2A>, this method returns that object.
trans-unit.target: Se houver uma correspondência exata do objeto especificado no <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter%2A>, esse método retorna o objeto.

trans-unit.source: If there are multiple matches of the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter%2A> object, this method arbitrarily returns one of the matching principals.
trans-unit.target: Se houver várias correspondências do <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter%2A> do objeto, este método retorna um dos objetos de correspondência arbitrariamente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal> object returned from this method matches the type of object contained in the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal> objeto retornado desse método corresponde ao tipo de objeto contido no <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The search is conducted in the context specified in the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.Context%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: A pesquisa é realizada no contexto especificado no <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.Context%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the [Query by Example](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/84ac40bb-04c4-4d0b-adaf-0ddb9253599e) overview topic.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte o tópico de visão geral [Query by Example](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/84ac40bb-04c4-4d0b-adaf-0ddb9253599e) (Consulta por Exemplo).

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter" /> contains referential properties.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter" /> contém propriedades referenciais.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the [Query by Example](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/84ac40bb-04c4-4d0b-adaf-0ddb9253599e) overview topic.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte o tópico de visão geral [Query by Example](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/84ac40bb-04c4-4d0b-adaf-0ddb9253599e) (Consulta por Exemplo).

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter" /> is a persisted principal.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter" /> é uma entidade de segurança persistente.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter" /> must first be assigned to the principal searcher before the query can be performed.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter" /> deve ser atribuído primeiro ao pesquisador de entidades de segurança antes que a consulta seja realizada.

trans-unit.source: Returns the underlying search object that is used by the Account Management API to perform the search.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o objeto de pesquisa subjacente usado pela API de Gerenciamento de Contas para executar a pesquisa.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher" />.

trans-unit.source: The application can modify the properties directly on the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher> object before executing the query.
trans-unit.target: O aplicativo pode modificar as propriedades diretamente no <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher> objeto antes de executar a consulta.

trans-unit.source: The query will then execute using the modified properties.
trans-unit.target: A consulta será executada em seguida, usando as propriedades modificadas.

trans-unit.source: For example, the default page size of 256 KB is used when the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher> class performs a query for <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.ContextType.Domain> principals.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, o tamanho de página padrão de 256 KB é usado quando o <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher> classe executa uma consulta para <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.ContextType.Domain> entidades.

trans-unit.source: The application may override the default value by setting the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher.PageSize%2A> property in the underlying <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher> object that is returned from this method.
trans-unit.target: O aplicativo pode substituir o valor padrão, definindo o <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher.PageSize%2A> propriedade subjacente <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher> objeto que é retornado deste método.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter" /> must first be assigned to the principal searcher before the query can be performed.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter" /> deve ser atribuído primeiro ao pesquisador de entidades de segurança antes que a consulta seja realizada.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter" /> contains referential properties.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter" /> contém propriedades referenciais.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the [Query by Example](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/84ac40bb-04c4-4d0b-adaf-0ddb9253599e) overview topic.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte o tópico de visão geral [Query by Example](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/84ac40bb-04c4-4d0b-adaf-0ddb9253599e) (Consulta por Exemplo).

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter" /> is a persisted principal.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter" /> é uma entidade de segurança persistente.

trans-unit.source: Returns the type of the object returned from the <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.GetUnderlyingSearcher" /> method.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o tipo do objeto retornado do método <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.GetUnderlyingSearcher" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Type" /> that specifies the type of object returned from the <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.GetUnderlyingSearcher" /> method.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Type" /> que especifica o tipo de objeto retornado do método <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.GetUnderlyingSearcher" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter" /> must first be assigned to the principal searcher before the query can be performed.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter" /> deve ser atribuído primeiro ao pesquisador de entidades de segurança antes que a consulta seja realizada.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the query filter that is used to locate matching principals.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o filtro de consulta que é usado para localizar as entidades de segurança correspondentes.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal" /> object that is used for the query or null if no filter is set.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal" /> que é usado para a consulta ou nulo se nenhum filtro for definido.

trans-unit.source: The principal object contained in this property can be any type of object derived from the principal class; computer, user, or group.
trans-unit.target: O objeto principal contido nessa propriedade pode ser qualquer tipo de objeto derivado da classe principal; computador, usuário ou grupo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter%2A> can also be an extended principal type that is defined by extending either <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal>, <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.UserPrincipal>, <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.GroupPrincipal> or <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.ComputerPrincipal>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter%2A> também pode ser um tipo de entidade estendido definido, estendendo o <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal>, <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.UserPrincipal>, <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.GroupPrincipal> ou <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.ComputerPrincipal>.

trans-unit.source: The type of the derived class object that is passed to this property determines the type of object that is queried.
trans-unit.target: O tipo do objeto de classe derivada que é passado para essa propriedade determina o tipo de objeto que é consultado.

trans-unit.source: The resulting query contains a logical AND of all the properties set on the specified principal object.
trans-unit.target: A consulta resultante contém um AND lógico de todas as propriedades definidas no objeto principal especificado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the Query by Example overview topic.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte o tópico de visão geral de Consulta por Exemplo.

trans-unit.source: For more information on the extended classes, see the [Principal Extensions](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/49d1b257-d652-4224-bdae-2edabced8f00) overview topic.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre as classes estendidas, consulte o [Principal extensões](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/49d1b257-d652-4224-bdae-2edabced8f00) tópico de visão geral.

trans-unit.source: Persisted Principal objects can not be used as the <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter" />.
trans-unit.target: Objetos de entidade de segurança persistentes não podem ser usados como o <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter" /> cannot be null or empty.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter" /> não pode ser nulo ou estar vazio.
